articles.title: UK records another 15,539 coronavirus cases, 397 deaths - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Another 15,539 people in Britain have tested positive for Covid-19, bringing the total number of coronavirus cases in the country to 1,705,971, according to the official figures released Saturday.
